newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - First Data rating lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - First Data rating lowered.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said it lowered its rating on First Data Corp to accumulate from buy.
-- Noted in a report the company guided Wall Street to a $1.60 earnings per share estimate for fiscal 1997, which had ranged from about $1.63 from $1.65.
-- "High levels of credit card debt and personal bankruptcies could fuel a slowdown caused by higher interest rates," the report said.
-- Said still recommended buying shares but "with a more cautionary attitude than before."
